name: Changes made (solicitor)
body:
Applicant 1: ((applicant name))
Applicant 2: ((respondent name))
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((solicitor name))

Applicant 1 has made changes to the application. You need to review and approve the application before it can be submitted. 

You can review the changes in the updated application PDF.

Review the joint application: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Joint ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)): changes have been made
